description: personal study ID composed by the first authors  first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
sex of the participant
role of the participant – focal_participant
name of the participant_2
sex of the participant_2
role of the participant_2 – partner
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee
name of the two participants that compose the dyad
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

study condition favourite for proposer (favourable for proposer in the publication. Proposer can choose between 3 for each or 5 for herself and 1 for responder)  and favourite for responder (favourable for responder in the publication. Proposer can choose between 3 for each or 5 for responder and 1 for proposer).
experience of the focal_participant in the task - 1 = first time participating / 2 = second time participating/ 3 = third time participating
experience of the partner in the task - 1 = first time participating/ 2 = second time participating
"whether the responder had access to leverage or not on a given trial "
food on the left side for the focal_participant (on the focal_participant's  side of the apparatus)
food on the left side for the partner (on the participants  side of the apparatus)
food on the right side for the focal_participant (on the focal_participant's  side of the apparatus)
food on the right side for the partner (on the participants  side of the apparatus)
number of food rewards the partner could obtain from the alternative (on the partners  side of the apparatus); blank spaces means the partner had no alternative available
food rewards the focal_participant could obtain based on the focal_participant's choice
food rewards the partner could obtain based on the partners choice
food rewards the focal_participant eats at the end of the trial
food rewards the partner eats at the end of the trial
whether the focal_participant maximized based on the options available
whether the partner maximized based on the options available
whether the partner access the alternative option
the side the focal_participant chose -  0 = right side/ 1 = means left side
